item.title: Sound Synthesis in the Browser
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Web Audio API is incredibly simple and fun to play with. But you need some understanding of sound synthesis in order to really have fun with it.In this talk we will go over the basic theory of sound synthesis, learn what oscillators, LFOs and FM synthesis is.Once we will have developed some understanding about […]
item.content:encoded: The Web Audio API is incredibly simple and fun to play with. But you need some understanding of sound synthesis in order to really have fun with it.In this talk we will go over the basic theory of sound synthesis, learn what oscillators, LFOs and FM synthesis is.Once we will have developed some understanding about the theory, we will see how easy it is to implement all of this in JavaScript.
